item.title: Control freak
item.description: Lately, admin panel seems to be a recurring theme in my life. I had a discussion with someone at a startup about which one to use. Needless to say, there is plenty of options in the market place – everything from home brew custom solution to managed services to low-code platforms. Stuff like this obviously requires some research before any commitment. Since the company needing this is a very early stage startup.
